template.name: Orange Network
template.notes:
Base color: FF6600 ~ Orange Extra: bf5200 ~ Darker orange Base left : FF0900 ~ Red Base right: FF9600 ~ Lighter orange Complement: 009AC2 ~ Blueish cyan
Fonts (all sans): • Body: Raleway • Table cells: Roboto, Roboto Condensed • Fixed width: Ubuntu Mono • Headings: Oswald
